newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch PTT sells small Dutch unit to Siemens.
newsitem.headline: Dutch PTT sells small Dutch unit to Siemens.

text.p: Dutch post and telecoms group PTT Nederland NV said on Friday it had sold a small unit to the Dutch subsidiary of Germany's Siemens AG.

The Dutch company said in a statement Siemens Nederland NV would take over its Logistiek Telecom Computer Repair unit from its PTT Telecom arm, with the 35 workers at the PTT business coming under Siemens management on February 1.
PTT Telecom will outsource computer repairs from the same dates, the statement said. -- Amsterdam newsroom +31 20 504 5000, Fax +31 20 504 5040.
